articles.title: American Trevor Reed is back in the US after being released from Russia in prisoner swap, his mother says - CNN
articles.description: American Trevor Reed, a US citizen and former Marine who had been detained in Russia since 2019, is back in the United States, his mother Paula Reed tweeted early Thursday.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)American Trevor Reed, a US citizen and former Marine who had been detained in Russia since 2019, is back in the United States, his mother Paula Reed tweeted early Thursday.
